attributes.action: Sanctuary in UK for Ukrainian citizens displaced due to Russia’s military action
attributes.additional_details: Because there are fellow Europeans who have been displaced as a result of conflict and require sanctuary.
attributes.background: Provide a safe haven for those Ukrainian citizens who have left their home country due to the Russian military action, by granting a UK visa for them to remain in the UK

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
